description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin Dip With Trick-Or-Treat Triangles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Veggie dip,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Halloween,Dairy free
name: Pumpkin Dip With Trick-Or-Treat Triangles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Toss pumpkin in oil and season. Place in a single layer on one tray. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until pumpkin is tender and browned. Cool for 10 minutes. Process pumpkin with beans, tahini, lemon juice, cumin and garlic in a food processor until smooth.
Meanwhile, spray bread with oil and sprinkle with sumac. Cut into triangles and place on second tray. Bake for 4-5 minutes or until golden.
Spoon dip into hollowed pumpkin and serve with triangles for dipping.
